data.lyric:
[ti:Everybody Hates Me]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:Sick Boy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Everybody Hates Me - The Chainsmokers
[00:00.48]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Emily Warren
[00:01.05]Composed by：Andrew Taggart
[00:01.44]Produced by：The Chainsmokers/Shaun Frank
[00:01.63]Yeah let's do it again but uh this time uh let's go full psycho
[00:07.18]Yeah I just wanna drink tequila with my friend
[00:10.22]She says she cheated 'cause she's tryna get ahead
[00:13.24]The more I read it yeah the more I take offense
[00:16.22]I'm so defeated I can't get outside my head
[00:19.44]I post a picture of myself 'cause I'm lonely
[00:21.96]Everyone knows what I look like
[00:23.32]Not even one of them knows me
[00:25.62]Yeah I just wanna drink tequila with my friends
[00:28.83]I'm so defeated I just want this s**t to end
[00:31.32]So I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[00:37.64]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[00:43.84]I'm talkin' to myself s**t now they think I'm crazy
[00:50.00]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[00:53.27]Everybody hates me
[00:54.90]Like everybody hates me
[01:07.06]Like everybody hates me
[01:13.52]Everybody yeah
[01:20.74]I'm a product of the internet
[01:23.08]And now I'm face to face with all the voices in my head
[01:26.17]I can't even check the time without facing regret
[01:29.25]Why do I still have to mean everything I ever said
[01:33.83]And I'm not tryna be like "Poor me" I made it
[01:36.28]I'm just trying to stay normal now that they know what my name is
[01:40.03]Yeah I just wanna drink tequila with my friends
[01:43.01]Yeah they're the reason that I still am who I am
[01:45.77]So I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[01:51.91]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[01:58.30]I'm talkin' to myself s**t now they think I'm crazy
[02:04.37]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[02:07.61]Everybody hates me
[02:09.19]Like everybody hates me
[02:21.37]Like everybody everybody hates me
[02:28.17]Everybody yeah
[02:35.56]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[02:41.60]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[02:47.68]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[02:57.29]I walk into the club like everybody yeah
[03:05.12]Everybody
[03:08.11]Everybody
[03:09.48]I walk into the club like everybody yeah
[03:17.32]Everybody
[03:19.09]Everybody hates me
[03:22.40]I walk into the club like everybody hates me
[03:25.80]Everybody yeah everybody
data.trans:
[ti:Everybody Hates Me]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:Sick Boy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.48]//
[00:01.05]//
[00:01.44]//
[00:01.63]再来一次 但这一次 让我们全力以赴 彻底疯狂吧
[00:07.18]想和我的朋友喝龙舌兰
[00:10.22]她说她骗了我 因为她想上头条
[00:13.24]我看得越多 就越会受到冒犯
[00:16.22]我是如此挫败 我不能停止思考
[00:19.44]我发了一张自拍 因为我很寂寞
[00:21.96]大家都知道我长什么样
[00:23.32]但没有一个能够理解我
[00:25.62]想和我的朋友喝龙舌兰
[00:28.83]我是如此挫败 我想忘记这种感觉
[00:31.32]所以我去酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[00:37.64]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[00:43.84]我在自言自语 可能他们觉得我疯了
[00:50.00]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[00:53.27]大家都厌恶我
[00:54.90]感觉所有人都恨我
[01:07.06]感觉所有人都恨我
[01:13.52]所有人
[01:20.74]我是网络的产物
[01:23.08]现在我和他们面对面接触 脑海里充斥着各种声音
[01:26.17]我甚至不知道现在是什么时间 满是懊悔
[01:29.25]为何我要对我说过的话负责呢
[01:33.83]我努力使自己看起来不是那么寒酸 我做到了
[01:36.28]我只想做个普通正常人 现在人们都知道了我的名字
[01:40.03]想和我的朋友喝龙舌兰
[01:43.01]因为他们 我才依然是我
[01:45.77]所以我去酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[01:51.91]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[01:58.30]我在自言自语 可能他们觉得我疯了
[02:04.37]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[02:07.61]大家都厌恶我
[02:09.19]感觉所有人都恨我
[02:21.37]感觉所有人都恨我
[02:28.17]所有人
[02:35.56]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[02:41.60]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[02:47.68]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[02:57.29]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人
[03:05.12]所有人
[03:08.11]所有人
[03:09.48]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人
[03:17.32]所有人
[03:19.09]大家都厌恶我
[03:22.40]我走进酒吧 感觉所有人都恨我
[03:25.80]所有人
